column1: The son of [[Adalgar Bolger]] and husband of [[Belba Baggins]], Rudigar became head of the [[Bolger Family]] as the eldest heir. He had one son, [[Herugar Bolger

The name contains ''hrod'' "fame" and ''gar'' "spear".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref> It is the Middle High German form of Old English ''[[wikipedia:Hrothgar
